title: Rapha typeface - Nick Cooke
content:
Hi there, I know that this typeface has been designed by Nick Cooke, and wondered wheter it is for sale, or has it been designed exclusively for Rapha.  
Thank you, Einat

 [‹ @ sign](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012054320/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46386 "Go to previous forum topic") [Slab serif from mag ad ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012054320/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46384 "Go to next forum topic")
author: einat

comments.content:
Thanks for your interest Einat. Unfortunately (for you) it is just a logo, not a typeface. I was thinking of developing one of the variations I did for the logo as a font, but I haven’t even started it, and with so many other things in the pipeline I can’t see it being published for at least 5 years.

Nick Cooke

Thanks for replying so fast. It is indeed unfortunate, as it is absulutely beautiful.  
Thanks again, Einat
